array.text: You can use Skill Scrolls to enhance skills. Enhancing skills increases their stats. There's an enhance cap based on skill grade. There's also a cap based on your character's level.
If you obtain a skill with a higher grade than one you've already enhanced, you can transfer its Enhance Level to the skill you've just obtained.
Fuse skills to create one with a higher grade. Fusion material varies by skill grade. You'll need 2 skills of the same grade and Element, or 1 identical skill of the same grade to perform a fusion.
You can reset enhanced skills to Lv. 1. In this case, you can get back every Skill Scroll you've used to enhance your skills. Resets require Blue Gems.
